_comment1: input_directory is the folder containing the input SDF files
_comment5: If using OPLS3, the ligprep_executable must be provided
_comment6: Path to the training set SMILES file (used for novelty calculation)
_comment7: Path to the training set file configuration, used for FDC calculation
_comment8: Path to the precomputed fragment contribution scores file (fpscores), required for Synthetic Accessibility (SA) score calculation

_comment9.calculate_qed: Whether to calculate the QED metric
_comment9.calculate_sa: Whether to calculate the SA metric

_comment10.calculate_2d_properties: Whether to calculate and extract 2D structural properties (includes two steps)
_comment10.calculate_stability: Whether to calculate the stability metric
_comment10.calculate_fcd: Whether to calculate the FCD score

_comment11.calculate_overall_diversity: Whether to calculate the overall diversity metric
_comment11.calculate_scaffold_diversity: Whether to calculate the scaffold diversity metric

_comment12.calculate_geometry_metrics: Whether to perform all geometry-related calculations (force field preparation, geometry parameters, and similarity metrics)
